subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin tied a career high with 5 points to surpass 100 for the second consecutive season and the Penguins beat the visiting Thrashers, 6-2, Tuesday night.
snippet: Evgeni Malkin tied a career high with 5 points to surpass 100 for the second consecutive season and the Penguins beat the visiting Thrashers, 6-2, Tuesday night.
